summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a disc containing discovery materials related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signatory of the letter providing the password for discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being transmitted.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the prosecution of Maxwell.

events.title: Criminal Case Against Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ongoing federal criminal prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell under docket number 20 Cr. 330.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
It provides the password ('USAOsdnyl!') for a disc containing discovery materials for inmate 02879-509 (Ghislaine Maxwell).
The case is identified as United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Audrey Strauss was the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York as of December 17, 2020.
The discovery materials were being sent to the legal department of the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn.
